ygData.subject: hello it me again Margaret!!! HEHEHE
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, How is everyone doing tonight? I am having troble with playing EverQuest. I was a stupid A*&, I bought the game and I did not look at the requirements.
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,
How is everyone doing tonight? I am having troble with playing
EverQuest. I was a stupid A*&, I bought the game and I did not look
at the requirements. And, my computer is not up to the task. I am
going to have to up grade it to play it hardcore. I am loooking
forward to playing on a normal bases. I am hoping reading all of the
posting that all of you make with pay off. I am a human paladin. Any
help or hints will be greatly appreciated! I am looking forward to
meet people on there and make friends and alliances.
David
